strategy_reasoning: Using the 'Cozy Pixel Art' aesthetic aligns perfectly with the brand's 'friendly, approachable, indie-dev' identity. By visualizing technical updates (like BYOP and architecture diagrams) as retro game items or cozy garden elements, we make complex dev-logs feel welcoming and nostalgic. The lime green and pastel palette ensures brand consistency while tapping into the popular 'cozy gaming' trend (Stardew Valley/Unpacking).

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art title screen. A cute chunky pixel bee character hovering over a wooden sign that says 'UPDATE LOG' in pixel font. Background is a soft gradient of lime green (#ecf874) to lavender. Floating pixel hearts and flowers. Warm, nostalgic lighting like Stardew Valley. High quality, detailed pixel art.
images.description: Cover image introducing the update log in a friendly retro game style.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of a tiny film director's chair and a clapperboard sitting in a digital garden. Dark purple and neon accents representing 'Onyx - AI Storyboard Engine'. Soft glow, 8-bit aesthetic. Background is a cozy pixelated movie studio mixed with nature elements. Text 'ONYX' in chunky pixel font. Lo-fi vibes.
images.description: Highlighting the new Onyx app with a cinematic yet cozy pixel theme.

images.prompt: A retro RPG inventory screen UI. One slot contains a glowing golden jar labeled 'BYOP' (Bring Your Own Pollen). Another slot contains a clean blue scroll labeled 'Mermaid Diagrams'. Soft pastel background, lime green (#ecf874) selection cursor. Cozy pixel art style like Unpacking. Warm and inviting.
images.description: Visualizing the BYOP docs and Mermaid diagram updates as collectable RPG items.

images.prompt: A peaceful pixel art animation frame of a tiny gardener character tidying up a digital flower bed. Removing duplicate weeds (representing the duplicate READMEs) and organizing files. Soft mint and peach gradient sky. Cozy, wholesome, clean lines. 8-bit aesthetic with modern lighting.
images.description: Representing the 'chore' and cleanup updates as gardening/tidying.

caption:

alt_text: A series of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A pixel bee with an Update Log sign. 2. A pixelated director's chair for Onyx app. 3. Retro game inventory showing a BYOP jar and diagram scroll. 4. A tiny pixel gardener tidying up a flower bed. All in soft pastels and lime green.
